intro: Grim is the Paragon of Altharion, the Bastion of the Graveborns. He is known as the legendary hitman who exists between the physical world and the dead. Wielding two supernatural firearms named Twin Shadows, he executes his targets with rhythmic precision.

abilities.name: Twin Shadows
abilities.details:
Grim's basic attacks fire twiceâ€”once from each gun. The second shot deals a percentage of the first shot's damage as magical damage and applies on-hit effects.

He will shoot the same target, else another target in range. The second shot is also affected by critical strike modifiers, but the critical chance is based on the first shot.

abilities.name: Piercing Darkness
abilities.details: Grim fires a high-velocity shadow laser in a line, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power and magical damage) to all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Shroud of Gloom
abilities.details: Grim designates a target location, creating a thick patch of gloomy shroud for a few seconds. Enemies standing within the shroud become nearsighted.

abilities.name: Dawning Shadow
abilities.details:
Grim dashes a short distance, leaving a Shadow at his starting location for a few seconds. He can re-activate this ability to instantly return to the Shadow.

If Grim scores a takedown before returning, or within few seconds after returning, the cooldown of Living Shadow is reset.

abilities.name: Last Whisper
abilities.details:
Grim allows his shadow to fully engulf him, gaining increased movement speed and ignoring unit collision.

In addition, his basic attacks have no travel time (including the second shot from Twin Shadows), and each shot ignores a percentage of the target's physical resistance and magical resistance respectively.
